summary: This module contains CDK-based integration test resources for validating node‑to‑node encryption on an Amazon OpenSearch (Elasticsearch) domain. It defines a stack that provisions the domain together with its networking, access control, and encryption settings, and includes test cases that confirm correct behavior.
business_intent: Enable automated verification that node‑to‑node encryption can be correctly configured and enforced for OpenSearch clusters, helping teams ensure data in transit between cluster nodes is protected before deploying to production.
